item.title: McCoy Global Inc. Announces Strategic Asset Acquisition of 3PS Inc.
item.description: [at noodls] - January 4, 2017 McCOY GLOBAL INC. ANNOUNCES STRATEGIC ASSET ACQUISITION OF 3PS, INC. ... This is an abstract of the original noodl. To continue reading this document, click here for the original version....
